name: parliament-chart
description: react-parliament-chart is a customizable React component that displays a parliament chart for visualizing the composition of a legislative body. With support for party colors and seat count, this component can be easily customized to match your needs. The included PartyTable allows for additional data display, making it easy to integrate into your project.react-parliament-chart is a customizable React component that displays a parliament chart for visualizing the composition of a legislative body. With support for party colors and seat count, this component can be easily customized to match your needs. The included PartyTable allows for additional data display, making it easy to integrate into your project.

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm test && npm run prettier && npm run lint

author: zyk
